name: E. Paint the Middle
statement:
You are given n elements numbered from 1 to n, the element i has value
a_i and color c_i, initially, c_i = 0 for all i.The following operation
can be applied: Select three elements i, j and k (1
leq i < j < k
leq n), such that c_i, c_j and c_k are all equal to 0 and a_i = a_k,
then set c_j = 1. Find the maximum value of
sum
limits_{i=1}^n{c_i} that can be obtained after applying the given
operation any number of times.
